Package es.upm.pproject.parkingjam.parking_jam.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
es.upm.pproject.parkingjam.parking_jam.model.Game
public class Game extends Object
The 'Game' class manages the current state of the game, including levels and scores. It provides methods to load new levels, move cars, undo movements, and save the game state.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Game()
    Constructs a new 'Game' object starting from level 1.

    Constructs a new 'Game' object starting from the specified level number.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(int numLevel) throws IllegalExitsNumberException, IllegalCarDimensionException
      Constructs a new 'Game' object starting from the specified level number.
      Parameters:
      numLevel - the starting level number.
      Throws:
      IllegalExitsNumberException - if there is an illegal number of exits in the level.
      IllegalCarDimensionException - if there are illegal dimensions for cars in the level.

    • Game

      public Game() throws IllegalExitsNumberException, IllegalCarDimensionException
      Constructs a new 'Game' object starting from level 1.
      Throws:
      IllegalExitsNumberException - if there is an illegal number of exits in the level.
      IllegalCarDimensionException - if there are illegal dimensions for cars in the level.

  • Method Details

    • getDimensions

      public Pair<Integer,Integer> getDimensions()
      Retrieves the dimensions (rows and columns) of the current level's board.
      Returns:
      a 'Pair' object containing the dimensions (rows, columns).

    • getBoard

      public char[][] getBoard()
      Retrieves the current board configuration of the level.
      Returns:
      a 2D char array representing the current board configuration.

    • loadSavedLevel

      public int loadSavedLevel(GameSaver gs) throws IllegalExitsNumberException, IllegalCarDimensionException
      Loads a saved level using the provided 'GameSaver' instance.
      Parameters:
      gs - the 'GameSaver' instance containing the saved game data.
      Returns:
      the level number of the loaded saved level.
      Throws:
      IllegalExitsNumberException - if there is an illegal number of exits in the level.
      IllegalCarDimensionException - if there are illegal dimensions for cars in the level.

    • loadNewLevel

      public int loadNewLevel() throws IllegalExitsNumberException, IllegalCarDimensionException
      Loads the next new level.
      Returns:
      the level number of the loaded new level.
      Throws:
      IllegalExitsNumberException - if there is an illegal number of exits in the level.
      IllegalCarDimensionException - if there are illegal dimensions for cars in the level.

    • moveCar

      public char[][] moveCar(char car, int length, char way) throws SameMovementException
      Moves a specified car on the current level board.
      Parameters:
      car - the identifier of the car to move.
      length - the distance to move the car.
      way - the direction (either 'H' for horizontal or 'V' for vertical) to move the car.
      Returns:
      a 2D char array representing the updated board configuration after the movement.
      Throws:
      SameMovementException - if the same movement has been attempted twice consecutively.

    • undoMovement

      public char[][] undoMovement() throws CannotUndoMovementException, SameMovementException
      Undoes the last movement made on the current level board.
      Returns:
      an 'OldBoardData' object representing the board state before the last movement.
      Throws:
      CannotUndoMovementException - if there is no movement to undo.
      SameMovementException - if the movement is to the same place.

    • getGameScore

      public int getGameScore()
      Retrieves the current game score, including accumulated and current level scores.
      Returns:
      the total game score.
